publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4575 Linda Fabiani: Abbeyfield Society Celebrating 50 Years—That the Parliament congratulates the Abbeyfield Society on its 50 years of providing sheltered housing and care for elderly people; congratulates Abbeyfield House in Strathaven on its 15 years of operation, and looks forward to Abbeyfield continuing that work.
S2M-4575 Abbeyfield Society Celebrating 50 Years (lodged on 19 June 2006) Michael Matheson*, Mike Pringle*, Derek Brownlee*
S2M-4575 Abbeyfield Society Celebrating 50 Years (lodged on 19 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Mr David Davidson*

S2M-4575 Linda Fabiani: Abbeyfield Society Celebrating 50 Years—That the Parliament congratulates the Abbeyfield Society on its 50 years of providing sheltered housing and care for elderly people; congratulates Abbeyfield House in Strathaven on its 15 years of operation, and looks forward to Abbeyfield continuing that work. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mike Pringle, Derek Brownlee, Donald Gorrie, Mr David Davidson
